thread.section_title: Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: LOVELY SPOT
thread.title_full: LOVELY SPOT - Review of Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: mrcmrc2
title: LOVELY SPOT
text:
We were given a warm welcome in Reception which was a pleasure. However, the room was rather smaller than we were expecting and was next to the lift.
The hotel has a very pleasant restaurant which was very popular with non-residents; always a good sign.
Overall, an acceptable stay.
Room Tip: NOT next to the lift. See more room tips
